values:
So Another update from the last! Things to note: Well Im 17 now....so yeHHHHHH....^__^

_____________________________________________________


x-posted to mission101_2009 12/31/08
Hi, everyone! This seemed like a cool idea to me since it usually takes longer than a year to do everything on my New Years List.

Right now I'm 15 and my 16th birthday is just a few days away on January 11, which is when I plan to really start going after things on this list, so at the end of this I'll be 18, wow amazing.. 18....legal to do most things. It's kinda scary. It seems like just yesterday I couldn't wait to turn 16 and now bam, 16.... so here goes my list.

  1. Get a Decent Job

  2. Get a Nice Boyfriend (One Year and counting!)

  3. Really, really go and take Belly Dancing Classes (and stick with it)

  4. Get down to a flattering weight for my height and frame (between 130 and 150lbs)

  5. Graduate High School School Early

  6. Seriously Go and take Japanese lessons (signed up at Japan Society!)

  7. Pick back up on French by any affordable means (Japanese is the priority, French can hold back)

  8. Get Decent Clothes for All my BJD's (Ball Jointed Dolls, Lord know their woefully under clothed)

  9. Go to an advanced sewing school or fashion house and upgrade sewing skills (I can sew and create clothes but I need to learn the high scale advanced technique so my creations can come out more Professional looking. that and so that I can go to design school if something goes wrong with my other plans.)

  10. Sell Something I've made

  11. Cosplay for real, and attend a convention in costume

  12. Create my own Lolita outfit

  13. Create My own Decora outfit

  14. Create my own Steampunk outfit

  15. Create my own Visual Kei look (and wear it for a day)

  16. Finish a Game for Nintendo DS

  17. Convince Parents that Personal Trainer is so worth the money

  18. Read The Da Vinci Code

  19. Grow My Hair

  20. Sew a something with extrem detail (for example a wedding dress with lots of beading)

  21. Learn to draw realistic human details

  22. Get at least 2 dolls [0 of 2] (I have about 7 now....)

  23. Get Utada Hikaru's Entire Discography (from Cubic U onwards)

  24. Go to a Psychic

  25. Buy True Religion Jeans (Vintage Bobby Godiva Jeans for the win!)

  26. Get a Nice Marc Jacobs Bag

  27. Get the ever elusive Wii Fit

  28. See a Flowering tea open up

  29. Get the Japanese app from App Store

  30. Create a Customized Iphone Theam for my Iphone

  31. Redesign the outside of my Iphone

  32. Get a belly button piercing (I have 2 now(

  33. Seriously consider a Nose piercing (I got it and love it!)

  34. Join a Sports Team (and stick with it)

  35. Go to a dollfie Meet up

  36. Get PS3

  37. Get Thermal Reconditioning (Japanese Hair Straighting Treatment) (I got Brazillian Keratin Instead because it made more sense)

  38. Get a New Ring

  39. Get a New Necklace

  40. Get a New Bracelet

  41. Fix old Bracelet

  42. Observe the planets and stars

  43. Take some photography classes

  44. Finish Building Website

  45. Learn Flash

  46. [Applicably only if # 2 come to be] Compose song on Piano for Boyfriend

  47. Convince Parents of Tivo's Worth

  48. Seriously Watch every episode of a TV Show

  49. Photoshop a Picture of myself

  50. Get Bodies for 2 of my dolls [0 of 2]

  51. Get a new Palm Device

  52. Learn to decorate cake

  53. Learn at lest one advanced makeup technique

  54. Dress up like a Geisha for a day

  55. Go see The Cherry Blossoms in season

  56. See Cirque Du Solei live

  57. See Equus

  58. Go see Alice In Wonderland 2010!!!!!!!!!!!

  59. Get The Disney Version of Alice in Wonderland

  60. Do a photo shoot of some kind

  61. Reapply to Fords modeling agency (and go in for the damn interview with money ready!!!)

  62. Get Some kind of spa treatment

  63. Write and Finish a Short Story and or Fan Fiction

  64. Get rid of Acne

  65. Take better care of body in general

  66. Learn to walk in stilettos with out breaking ankles

  67. Learn to play at least one song on the guitar

  68. Learn proper table manners

  69. Learn one DDR (Dance Dance Revolution) Song

  70. Build a bear at The Build a Bear Workshop

  71. Go See The Ball Drop In Times Square (either in 2010 or 2011)

  72. Make a Scrapbook

  73. Send in an Audition tape to America's Got Talent

  74. Make a home movie featuring my kitten

  75. Get the Sims 3 and make some custom content

  76. Go see a beauty consultant

  77. Go inside The Fuse Network Place by Madison Square Garden

  78. Go to a High Class Hair Salon

  79. Buy a new lens for my DSRL

  80. Go to a Club

  81. Get a tattoo

  82. Launch my BJD Clothing line

  83. Record a demo Album

  84. Name a star after myself

  85. Read more fashion magazines

  86. Get a new Pocket Camera

  87. Spend a day in a park with someone (preferably with said boyfriend)

  88. Get a full body Henna Tattoo

  89. Get a Decent Blonde Pageboy Wig for everyday use (So I can look like Mello from Death Note anytime I want)

  90. Get Blue, Green and Grey Colored Contacts

  91. Try Lunapads

  92. Buy 30 cases of Mango Passion Snapple and drink it all (yum....)

  93. Go see a live concert

  94. Get Official Drivers Licenses

  95. Get Car (preferably Mercedes ML class.....*twitchtwitch*

  96. Send something in to Post Secret

  97. Learn to Pole Dance

  98. Dress Like a Sean Kid for a day

  99. Go to Japan

  100. Have an entry for every month in my journal for 2009

  101. Enjoy 16th Birthday

Tada My list. Some of the things may seem a bit crazy but thats why this list is great I have time to do it and lord knows I need time for things.....

A while ago I made this so I think it's time for an update....All the bolded ones are stuff I've done, italics mean that Im close.

Your result for The Steampunk Style Test...

The Gadgeteer

32% Elegant, 52% Technological, 30% Historical, 52% Adventurous and 34% Playful!

You are the Gadgeteer, the embodiment of steampunk technology. Ironically, many of the things that most define your style are probably too large to easily carry about, but given the opportunity you would prefer to be seen surrounded by boiler engines, gear-driven calculators, and incredible automata. Of all the steampunk fashion styles, you place the greatest emphasis on technological accessories, and you are the most likely to create elaborate gadgets that are as much a part of your outfit as your clothes. You probably have goggles, but unlike most people you consider them to be for more than decoration. Whereas most people might look odd carrying a satchel of tools around, for you they may well be essential. Above all, you remind everyone that what sets the genre apart from Victoriana is simply the level of technology.


 


 


Try our other Steampunk test here.


Take The Steampunk Style Test at HelloQuizzy

So tomorrow I'm leaving for Canada. I'm getting my hair and nails done to day but while packing I noticed something very strange...... All my luggage had hello kitty on it... So to preserve my sanity I got my Victoria Secret duffle bag and decided to pack some sweaters Hyura and the most recent Asashii. I picked him up at the post office yesterday... He's an Alice of Labyrinth Bertram.. He looks weird with out makeup!!!! Haha! And yes the whole doll gang is coming with me for company... Since my family is driving... The gang doesn't have to wait till August to go to England with me, in fact I can now be slective in who goes since they all have officialy been to another country!!

I got my hair style and nail art from Japanese books at Kinokuniyas... I love that place!!!!! They have everything, but at a price. Its super expensive!! They never have sales! I pay full price for everything but the manga is to die for!!! And they have a yaoi section!!!! A massive one too.

Well its early and I need sleep before my 9:30 appoitment so bye!

  • Punch someone
  • grab a cute guy at random and feel him up
  • yell at someone
  • pole dance at a club
  • steal expensive things
  • rob a bank
  • tell God I'm sorry

Another badass quiz from eSPIN-the-Bottle...

The eSPIN Personality Test


MY RESULT:Dramasaurus




Well, we have to admit - we're impressed. You do what you do really well. You're in control of your own destiny, and you always get your way.



The downside: you're just a tiny bit stuck-up. Seriously, it wouldn't hurt if you stepped back every once in a while and realized that there were other people on Earth besides you. It might humble you a little, but even better, you might meet some totally awesome people you wouldn't have even considered before. There's a lot of cool folks out there, and you might miss them if you're not careful.

Hello long time no see....sorry so busy..and I lost my password..gosh oh well I'm on Xanga.com now :www.Xanga.com/Distant__Kingdom...go see me please...........

Hi all this is my first entry so I'm going to tell you all a bit about my
I like Blue and Black because it repersents my life hidden in darkness  with no way out dreams and hope that keep me alive.
I like all kinds of music expically Japanese pop.my faveorite artic are Utada Hikaru,Frou Frou,Do as Infinty,BoA,Eminem,D12,Maroon5,Savage Garden,Dirty Vegas,Eiffil65 and more
I have a computerised band Called Celestrial Blue as well as CSLN,Cosmic Hue,The KH Crew,and Y.U.M.I.
I like to write songs
I love to read and write  fanfiction expically About Sora and Riku or Leon(Squall)and Cloud and Septhroith and Cloud from Kingdom Hearts and Final Fantasy.
I have a bitch list
I have a Who I whould live to fuck me list
